[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ContextMenuRegistry](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.md)

## ContextMenuRegistry namespace

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace ContextMenuRegistry 
```

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ScopeType](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.scopetype_enum.md) | Where this menu item should be rendered. If the menu item should be rendered in multiple scopes, e.g. on both a block and a workspace, it should be registered for each scope. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.contextmenuoption_interface.md) | A menu item as presented to contextmenu.js. |
|  [LegacyContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.legacycontextmenuoption_interface.md) | A subset of ContextMenuOption corresponding to what was publicly documented. ContextMenuOption should be preferred for new code. |
|  [RegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.registryitem_interface.md) | A menu item as entered in the registry. |
|  [Scope](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.scope_interface.md) | The actual workspace/block where the menu is being rendered. This is passed to callback and displayText functions that depend on this information. |
